page.title: 02HOME LIFE: TRACEY'S DAY
page.content: Every morning my mum wakes me up at {7 o clock.}I have cereal for breakfast and then have a wash and get dressed. Next I read my book and then pack my bag and get ready for school. When my brother is ready we leave. My dad leaves for Peterborough at the same time. When we get to school we wait for the whistle and then go in and sit down while the register is called. We assemble in the hall and first we sing a hymn. My favourite hymn is{Living {Lord.}Then we have a story about caring. Back in the classroom we do mathematics and write a story. In the afternoon we have music and listen to a story. During playtime I sometimes play{French Skipping.}We go home at 3.30. I have my tea and sometimes go up to see the horses in the field. I like{horse riding}very much. Afterwards I usually go to bed.
